title: Looking Forward to a Cold Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Shioriko-chan, I think the coat you’re trying on right looks the best on you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Thank you. I like it too, but I’m not sure if it would be suitable for a cold day since it doesn’t have a thick lining......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s made of compressed wool, so I think it should be fine. There are a lot of coats made with that fabric lately.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Compressed wool... Judging by the name, the fabric is dense, so it’ll be difficult for the wind to come through?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah, something like that. If it’s freezing, you can put this on...... Here, a scarf. You’ll be fine even in the dead of winter!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Oh, right! Thanks, Kotori-san, you’re very knowledgeable. Then, I’ll go with this one......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>This winter, let’s hang out a lot together while you wear that coat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Of course! Okay, now to pick out a coat that would look good on you, Kotori-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, I wonder what you have in store for me, Shioriko-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>There are so many items I want you to try on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
